summary: Adds enchantments for destruction damage, conjuration duration, etc.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Enchant Magic Damage and Potency
Version: 1.0
Date: 4/3/2012
Category: Magic - Spells & enchantments
Author(s): Cupressi
Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14265
Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=20491

Description
===========
Steel can progress to legendary power. Magic stays the same the day you learned the spell from the tome. Good thing you can reduce spell cost by 100% because you needed to cast it 50 times to kill anything.

This mod adds 5 circlets which you can disenchant to give you the ability to enchant your armor to increase spell damage and potency.
-Alteration: increases spell duration
-Conjuration: increase spell duration
-Destruction: increase spell damage
-Illusion: increase level effectiveness
-Restoration: increase spell potency

The circlets are enchanted at a 50% increase so they can be used for characters without a high enchanting skill. The enchantments will be somewhat more powerful than what you can reach with the weapon damage enchantments. This feels balanced since you can drastically improve weapons with smithing but cannot do so with magic. The power level feels appropriate compared to an equivalent weapon.

Location
========
College of Winterhold, Hall of Countenance, 2nd floor next to the enchanting alter.

Install
=======
NMM:
1. Click activate

Manual:
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\\skyrim\\Data
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.

Uninstall
=========
NMM:
1. Click deactivate

Manual:
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the .esp file from \\skyrim\\Data

Incompatibility
===============
Should be compatible with everything unless another mod puts something where the circlet box is. No vanilla assets are altered.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None at the moment. If you find something please post a comment or PM me.

History
=======
